page.title: 03A day in the life of a Mum
page.content: I got up at 6.30am and I went straight down to the bathroom.I went back up stairs to dress.I was going to wear my blue and brown dress and my cream tights and my black high heeled shoes. When I was ready I went down to the kitchen for breakfast.I was having buttered toast.Next I put on my make up,I put on my coat and left for work at 8.30am.I caught the bus to work.I work at an old people's home.I started straight away washing the laundry at great speed and at 10am I went for my tea break.I finished the rest of the laundry and at 12.45pm I went home for dinner.I had egg,chips and beans.Then I sat down to relax and watch television until the children came home at 3.30pm.At 5.30pm I had some salad for tea.After tea I did the washing up and sat down to watch television and at 11.00 I went to bed.
